item.title: Illegal parking oldhill (as usual), 30th November
item.description:
All four of the cars in this image are illegally parked, restricting flows of traffic on oldhill. The road is an absolute goldmine for parking enforcement yet no one is here so the roads remain dangerous and constantly congested- but you can park anywhere!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Feldman Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree blocking public footpath, 30th November
item.description:
There is a severely overgrown tree at this address which is now obstructing the public pavement. The branches are hanging across the footpath and forcing pedestrians to step into the road to pass. This is especially dangerous for elderly residents, parents with pushchairs, wheelchair users, and people with mobility issues. The pavement is effectively not safely usable at this point. This has been getting progressively worse and now requires urgent attention before someone is injured. Please can this be inspected and trimmed back as a matter of priority to restore safe public access to the pavement. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathside Avenue, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
